title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being dirtied even though no changes are made, and code assist is not appearing.
OB: When I use code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes are made. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the file in the IDE. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature. 
3. Check if the file is marked as dirty without any changes being made. 
4. Verify that the code assist feature does not appear as expected.
